about_me:
I am a software developer with 8+ years of experience and worked on various core technology like (Android Application Development, MERN Stack development, Fullstack Web development using Django and many more). And in recent years, I have started pursuing my interest in application security because after having a solid background in software development, I need to understand the security flaws in the application and follow the best coding practices to secure the platforms. And currently, I am doing research in API Security testing to find a vulnerability in a microservices platform and learning new tools & techniques to understand web security exploitation in-depth.

To share my work with the community, I have also developed a blogging platform known as HackbotOne. And in this platform, I publish articles related to open-source projects, application security, software development, etc. Also, some of my work got featured in various InfoSec & Developer communities & research conferences. You can find the details in the featured work section on the website. I'll highly encourage you to visit the HackbotOne website.

As a hobby love to play PlayStation games in my free time and (WatchDog/WatchDog2) are some of my favourite games of all time.
